subject: Football
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Anyone who ever lettered in football for Rutgers is allowed to stand next to the end zones during home games. But what began as a way to honor former players has become a way to suffocate them.
snippet: Anyone who ever lettered in football for Rutgers is allowed to stand next to the end zones during home games. But what began as a way to honor former players has become a way to suffocate them.
